Replace.Text: Replaces builder with a bit more [ICON_Movement] movement and a bit more labor than builder.
Replace granary, +2[ICON_Housing] housing +1[ICON_Culture] culture value, +2[ICON_Food] food, +3[ICON_FAITH] faith, and +4[ICON_Amenities] amenity within 5 blocks.

The special improvement facility of the Sun Flower Field provides +1 [ICON_Culture] culture value, +2 [ICON_FAITH] faith and +1 [ICON_Gold] gold coin, and the holy land can obtain standard bonuses from the flower field. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE]Adjacency bonus after unlocking Municipal Feudalism: Flower Fields get +2 [ICON_Gold] for every two adjacent Flower Fields. [NEWLINE]Adjacency bonus after unlocking the standardization of technology parts: Every flower field adjacent to a flower field will get +2 [ICON_Gold] gold coins
If it were me... flowers could bloom even in the clouds

Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen provides +1 [ICON_Culture] culture output. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] After researching education, each citizen will get +0.5 [ICON_Science] technology value output, and after researching scientific theory, there will be an additional +0.5 [ICON_Science] technology value output.

Each improved facility "Flower Field" will provide 3% extra [ICON_Culture] culture value for the city where it is located, [ICON_Science] technology value output and increase the city's 2% [ICON_Production] productivity.

Involved in an incredible storm, walking forward in confusion, and you, the great Kazami Yuka-sama, will surely lead us out of the boundless darkness and give us hope and dreams. Tell the expectation of flowers in another world, and reshape the golden color of the sun flower field.

Each [ICON_Citizen] citizen provides +1 [ICON_Culture] culture output. [NEWLINE] After researching education, each citizen will get +0.5 [ICON_Science] technology value output, and after researching scientific theory, there will be an additional +0.5 [ICON_Science] technology value output.
All military units have +7 [ICON_Strength] attack power in any case, but [ICON_Production] production -30% when producing any unit

Because of Kazami Yuka's powerful demonic power, it affected the units of Kazami Yuuka's civilization, and eventually the demonic powers attracted each other and gathered into a builder named "Flower Farmer".

As a special unit that gathers Kazami Yuka's monster power, it does not have strong combat power itself, but they are professional in terms of construction. During Kazami Yuka's leadership, they opened up countless territories and built countless facilities. Contributed a huge role to the development of civilization.

The sea of ​​flowers is a characteristic building that was born unconsciously because of Kazami Yuuka's obsession with flowers. Rather than saying that the city center contains the sea of ​​flowers, it is better to say that the sea of ​​flowers adorns the city center. The flowers keep growing under the unconscious power of Youxiang. , so there is no need to pay too many resources for it, and the people also like this environment very much and are proud of it.

Compared with Huahai, Huatian did not rely on Youxiang's own strength. As artificial cultivation, it can give Youxiang extra strength. Although it is not a particularly delicate facility, it is also indispensable. It is also due to the relationship between Huahai and Huatian Existence, forming the culture with the characteristics of Sun Flower Field civilization.

It is unlocked after studying military engineering. It is used to inspire Youxiang to gain more power. It gains power by absorbing "world structure". Only one can be built globally and the first phase of power acquisition projects can be carried out after construction. It can give a large bonus to the surrounding areas that need it, and a small bonus to other areas. And get bonuses from flower fields, military camps, industrial areas, and colleges get a lot of bonuses. When used as the starting point of a trade route, you can get +4 [ICON_Production] production from that trade route.
The research institute for harvesting power, known as the Harvester, can be used for the second phase of the power acquisition project after construction
The obtained power can be further purified compared to before, so as to obtain a stronger ability. After construction, the third phase of the power acquisition project can be carried out
+3 [icon_SCIENCE] from adjacent G.O.T.S Institute of Strength
The first phase of research can make the flowers grow more luxuriantly. In the future, all cities will have +2 [ICON_Amenities] livability, which can be completed twice
In the first phase of research, energy can be obtained from flowers and people's thoughts on flowers, and all cities in the future will have +8%[icon_PRODUCTION]productivity
In the first phase of research, more energy can be obtained from flowers and people's longing for flowers, and all cities will have +8% [icon_PRODUCTION] productivity in the future

In the first phase of research, a huge amount of energy can be obtained from flowers and people's yearning for flowers around the world. In the future, all cities will have +8% [icon_PRODUCTION] productivity

The first phase of research can make flowers absorb people's redundant thoughts and have stronger vitality, thereby promoting the development of cities with flowers as the main body. In the future, all cities will +10% [icon_GOLD] gold coins

The first phase of research can make the vitality of flowers overflow and transfer them to places where they are needed, thereby promoting the development of cities with flowers as the main body. In the future, all cities will add 10% [icon_GOLD] gold coins

In the first phase of research, all units can obtain the power from Youxiang, which has been continuously expanded after research, and use it for mobility. All units have +1 [ICON_Movement] movement power, which can be researched twice
In the second phase of research, give the fragments of Yuxiang power to military units, so that they can obtain more powerful board capabilities, and +8 [ICON_Strength] attack power in any case

In the second phase of research, due to too many affairs to deal with, through the unique power network generated by Youxiang through continuous strengthening, connect an external brain to handle government affairs, +1 wild card policy slot
The second phase of research, obtained after the birth of No. 1, +1 wildcard policy slot

In the second phase of research, all units are more accepted by the world after receiving the influence of Youxiang's natural power, and can recover HP after taking action, and +5 HP recovery per round

The third phase of research, if completed, would mean an easy win. [NEWLINE] After absorbing all the power, Youxiang's power continued to expand, becoming an incomparably huge center for power transportation. [NEWLINE]Add 30 Attack to all units

The third phase of research, if completed, would mean an easy win. [NEWLINE] Seek for the most peaceful Youxiang, through continuous collection of power, with emotion, write the beauty of peace directly into everyone's heart, and rewrite everything. [NEWLINE]+10 Diplomatic Victory Points

The third phase of research, if completed, would mean an easy win. [NEWLINE]Using flowers as the carrier, Youxiang infuses the purified power of this world into it, giving the flowers an unparalleled life, connecting them together through their uniqueness, stimulating endless potentials, and the hometown of flowers was born. [NEWLINE]Each flower field will give the city +20%[icon_SCIENCE]science value+20%[icon_CULTURE]culture value+20%[icon_PRODUCTION]productivity

In Gensokyo, if you continue to explore in the opposite direction of the youkai mountain, you will find the sun flower field, which is quite far from the human village. [NEWLINE]There are countless sunflowers here, which may sound drab, but it's actually a sight to behold. The sun flower itself is actually nothing special. Compared with this, there are many fairies here during the day, and energetic youkai gather at night.

But the tranquility will always be broken, well, it is not a particularly strange thing for Gensokyo to change. This time, on an ordinary day in Gensokyo, there was no one in the sun flower field. After Cirno, who had just visited here, reported to Reimu, Reimu was dragged by Marisa next to him. [NEWLINE] Three days later, "Benwen News" [NEWLINE] According to the investigation, there was a disappearance in Gensokyo Sunflower Field. A certain fairy said that Hakurei Miko had brought a black and white magician to investigate, so far there is no news. [NEWLINE]The list of known missing persons is now released:[NEWLINE]Rinnosuke Mori, Medicin Mehrenkuri, Kawashiro Komachi, Onozuka Komachi, Tei Inaba, Alice Margotroyd

Sunflower Field is good at speeding up its own development by building characteristic improvement facilities. Compared with fighting, it is easier to surpass opponents in technology and culture. But this does not mean that they are weak in the war, so they are actually a terrifying opponent.

Kazami Yuka benefits from the characteristic improvement facilities and abilities, and has a technological and cultural development speed far faster than other civilizations, which makes them ahead of their opponents in culture and technology. Finally, through the crushing of technological trees, the blessing of policies, etc., Do not fall behind in various competitions, and even crush opponents in wars. Maybe Sunflower Fields will fall behind in the early stages, but they will get stronger as the game progresses, so it is important to withstand the pressure in the early game. It can be found that Sunflower Field can complete any form of victory. At the same time, the residents of Sunflower Field are influenced by their leaders and prefer to challenge themselves, fighting against the strong rather than the weak.

Youkai that live in Gensokyo. Possesses the ability to manipulate flowers. I like seasonal flowers very much, spring flowers in spring, summer flowers in summer, autumn flowers in autumn, and a small amount of winter flowers in winter, and strive to have flowers bloom at all times of the year.

But this time, Yuka Kazami is still Yuka Kazami, but she is not in Gensokyo anymore. [NEWLINE] One day, Master Youxiang was sleeping, and then the ground began to vibrate inexplicably. She came outside wearing clothes. The ground was indeed vibrating slightly, but there was a disgusting smell in the air, which made her very puzzled. The smell passed, and she saw a "person" made up of constantly flickering black and white TV snowflakes. Youxiang didn't notice his face, but she instinctively felt his sight, and then she had a headache, woke up at night, and the boundless sun flower field was replaced by a wide plain, and there were still friends from Gensokyo lying around, and there were many people in the middle. There was a great fire. [NEWLINE] [NEWLINE] (Current staff: Kazami Yuka, Medicin Mehrankuri, Kawashiro Komachi, Onozuka Komachi, Inaba Tei, Alice Margotroyd)

Of course, they agreed, otherwise there would be no follow-up story. After burning the book, the surrounding mountains rose up, the ground sank, cracked, and was filled by rivers. In the distance, it can be seen that it is covered by the ocean. The bodies of the girls also became lighter, and they found that they could fly at an incredible speed, observe between the sky and the earth, and have an extra manual. It records the content of the entire activity, which can be regarded as an encyclopedia. "

"From the first germs of life underwater...to the giant beasts of the Stone Age...to the first man to walk upright, you've come a long way. Now embark on your greatest quest yet: from the cradle of early civilizations to the vast Xingyu." Everyone said in unison, and after the recitation, there was no one around them, as if the original space had been separated.
(You have seen this, have you noticed something is wrong, um, where is it?)
Lord of Flowers of the Four Seasons
Likes powerful civilizations and dislikes civilizations with low culture values.
You are powerful and I love being friends with people like that.
It seems that your people don't have the capital to be proud of their own culture, do they?
It seems that we can be allies.
I think the current words are too hasty.
After consideration, I think we can form a strong alliance, are you willing to fight side by side with me?
To challenge me to force is a ridiculous decision, if you think you can succeed, you can try it.
hehe. . . Hehehe. . . It's almost there, I really can't bear to listen to your filthy and ugly cry like a swamp toad
Gift, yes, I accept it, thank you. . . Thanks?
For now, I don't need it yet, no problem, it's better for you to keep it for yourself.
Your city looks very nice and charming, I'd love to visit it, is that ok?
Blame me, yes, at least I admire you for your courage.
I feel that your existence is like a pest on the sunflower. [NEWLINE] (condemns you)
Kazami Youxiang, first time meeting, please take care of me.
The sun flower field has a nice view, I suggest you to visit more. Although the flower field as big as in the book is no longer there, the current one is enough to appreciate.
Remember, the leprechauns that roam around are a feature of Sunflower Fields and have to be played with.
Today is good, the flowers in the flower field will be in a good mood, and of course I am the same.
Goodbye, hope next time will be more enjoyable.
Going it alone is not good for survival, that's advice, you know what I mean.
An alliance is good for us both, I'm ready, how about you?
Peaceful days are the happiest days, everyone likes it, so I like it too.
Hehe, I don't think there is any benefit in this, and no one will be happy in the end.
I think it's time to bring things back to peace, what do you think?
It's okay, I agree, just don't step on the flowers.
It would be more convenient if I could pass through your country, so please excuse me, would you agree to my request?
Your army looks happy eating and drinking on my border, I don't want to make them unhappy, understand?
I didn't expect that I would lose. I don't know what happened to the others. Are they okay?
I didn't expect that I would lose. I don't know what happened to the others. Are they okay?
You actually think this is okay? Well, maybe the values ​​are different.
